Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partly dark-red in section and contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of four lines lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393779) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393779)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.12)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 12 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
